𝐕𝐢𝐫𝐭𝐮𝐚𝐥 𝐃𝐢𝐠𝐢𝐭𝐚𝐥 𝐇𝐞𝐚𝐥𝐭𝐡𝐜𝐚𝐫𝐞 𝐈𝐧𝐧𝐨𝐯𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧 𝐂𝐨𝐧𝐟𝐞𝐫𝐞𝐧𝐜𝐞: 𝐒𝐞𝐩𝐭𝐞𝐦𝐛𝐞𝐫 𝟏𝟐, 𝟐𝟎𝟐𝟒 It is becoming clear and apparent that digital healthcare is the way forward and a part of our lives moving forward. Digital healthcare assists and improves the services to healthcare providers, hospital administrators, insurance companies and most of all patients, especially in marginalized communities. Previously, patients had to come to healthcare but now healthcare can come to where they are. No one will be left behind. It is more important then ever, now that our women healthcare is on systematic assualt. I am thinking about this for children in Gaza where doctors can perform surgeries through remote robots and remote machines. The best care they need. This is also Lean thinking where equipment are on wheel, mobile and small footprint with value add services. That’s why now digital healthcare conferences are very important where all the stake holders can meet and share their knowledge, vision and research for better healthcare. If you are a healthcare professional, provider, supporter, administrator or investor, please attend virtual Digital Healthcare Innovation Conference 2024 on September 12 hosted by Eprenz LinkedIn community . You can be a speaker, panelist, sponsor or regular attendee. The Becker's Healthcare Conference left an indelible mark on our team at Radiant Healthcare. Now that we're back home, we're excited to share our post-Becker's roadmap with you. Here are some of the future steps and initiatives we're planning: • Trying New Things: We got a lot of great ideas at the conference. We want to try them out, like new technology and better ways to take care of people. • Expanding Our Network: The connections made at the conference were invaluable. We're excited to nurture existing relationships and forge new ones with like-minded individuals and organizations. • Sharing Our Expertise: Knowledge-sharing is paramount to us. We'll be publishing articles, and participating in conferences to disseminate our insights far and wide. • Improving Our Solutions: Continuous improvement is key. We'll conduct user research, gather feedback, and test new features to ensure our solutions meet the evolving needs of our partners. #HealthcareInnovation #Networking #KnowledgeSharing #ContinuousImprovement #HealthcareFuture #TechInHealthcare #CollaborationGoals #BetterCare

🎉 Elevate Your Impact in Healthcare: Secure Your Spot for "The Future of Virtual Healthcare" Conference! 🎉 📅 Date: October 14th 📍 Venue: Ontario Science Centre 🚀 Ready to Revolutionize Healthcare? Join Us - One Month Left! 🚀 The countdown has begun! In just one month, witness the healthcare evolution unfold at the "Future of Virtual Healthcare: Redesigning the Rehabilitation System by 2033" conference. Located at the prestigious Ontario Science Centre, this game-changing event is your passport to the future of healthcare! 🌐 Discover the Unseen: Dive deep into visionary discussions, unlock revolutionary insights, and witness groundbreaking innovations that are rewriting the rules of rehabilitation. We're not just talking about change – we're ushering in a new era of healthcare excellence. 🔥 Unparalleled Highlights: 🔹 Dynamic Speaker Lineup: Immerse yourself in conversations led by leaders shaping the virtual healthcare landscape. 🔹 Live, Hands-On Demos: Experience firsthand how virtual advancements are reshaping patient care and supercharging recovery. 🔹 High-Octane Networking: Forge connections with trailblazers, professionals, and visionaries carving paths in healthcare's virtual frontier. 🎯 Who Should Attend: Calling all healthcare disruptors, industry trailblazers, researchers, tech aficionados, and anyone fuelled by the potential of virtual healthcare's future! 🎟️ Limited Tickets – Maximize Your Impact: Ready to secure your place at the forefront of healthcare innovation? Seize this opportunity to propel your knowledge and career to new heights. The clock is ticking – early bird tickets are disappearing fast! 🎫 Grab Your Ticket: https://lnkd.in/gbTrep9q 📢 Stay in the Loop: @VirtualCareRehab 🔖 Event Hashtag: #FutureOfVirtualHealthcare #virtualcarerehab 📣 The Future Starts Now: With just one month left, now's your chance to lead the change in healthcare. Don't just witness history – make history! Mark your calendar for October 14th and prepare to reshape the future of healthcare, today. 🌟🏥🚀

This week we are excited to be at #HLTH2023 in Las Vegas where Maria Mentzer is joining the discussion on healthcare innovation! Our solutions are helping front line healthcare workers report and respond to issues faster for better organizational performance and better healthcare for patients, so we are loving the focus on innovation! If you’re at HLTH this week, connect with Maria Mentzer to learn how hospitals and healthcare systems including Baptist Memorial Health Care are embracing See to Solve. 👏 Maria’s favorite nugget from #HLTH2023 panel with Arianna Huffington Andrew Diamond and Neil Lindsay... ✔️On driving behavior change: Make it easy to do the right thing, make it fun enjoyable, systematize it. 💥Exactly! See the problem, solve the problem, share what you learned. That's what our solutions are all about. Maria will be at the conference through Wednesday, so reach out and connect! #HealthTech #Innovation #lean #continuousimprovement #healthcareimprovement

Discover how groundbreaking innovations and the latest technologies are transforming healthcare at the ICT&health World Conference 2025. Learn how these advancements put professionals and patients at the center, support medical staff, and reduce workload. Discover how secure data collection and sharing improve diagnostics and how advanced infrastructures scale up remote care. Additionally, see how these innovations enhance decision-making on the workplace and governance levels. Experience live how operations are elevated with the newest technologies and how diagnostics are optimized. Explore new financing opportunities and see how collaboration between healthcare organizations, both locally and internationally, is fostered and what it yields. All of this contributes not only to better and more enjoyable healthcare but also to cost reduction and, most importantly, to improving patients’ lives and making healthcare accessible worldwide. What makes this conference unique is that it doesn’t make empty promises. Here, real knowledge is shared, and collaboration is encouraged, leading to tangible changes in the healthcare sector. You don’t want to miss this! Pre-registration is open. Claim your ticket now: https://lnkd.in/eR5KJWCY #heallthcare
